You should be dating a Cancer. 21 June - 22 July This mate is protective, kind and compassionate. Though this crab can often be possessive, moody or crabby, he or she is strongly attached to his/her sexual partner. urlLink What Zodiac Sign Are You Attracted To? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

-Perfect- You're the perfect girlfriend. Which means you're rare or that you cheated :P You're the kind of chick that can hang out with your boyfriend's friends and be silly. You don't care about presents or about going to fancy placed. Hell, just hang out. You're just happy being around your boyfriend. urlLink What Kind of Girlfriend Are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

ToDaY iS HoMeCoMiNg !!! WoW TiMe iS GoiN' FaSt, i'M StArTiN' Mi DriViN LeSSoNs AnD iTs GoNnA Be ScArY, JuSt KnOwiNg ThAt i WiLL Be NoW DriViN aLL ThE TiMe FoR Mi MoM CuZ ShE iS LoSiN' HeR LiCeNsE CuZ ThEy SaiD ShE CaN't LeGaLLi DriVe AnYmOrE CuZ ShE iS ToO BLiNd.... :( NoW fOr HoMeCoMiNg DaY!!! iT wAs CraZi DoiN LaSt MiNuTe ShOpPiNg!!! i GoT Mi OuTfiT CoMpLeTeD TeN MiNuTeS B4 HoMeCoMiNg StArTeD, AnD We WeReN't LaTe EiThEr!!! Ha, WeLL MaYbE Bi A FeW MiNuTeS OnLy CuZ Mi MoM MeT DaViD's MoM AnD ThEy WeRe JaBBeRiNg AwAy (( TaLkiN tHaT iS )), aNd TaKiNg ToNs & ToNs oF PicS... o . O...... BuT iT WaS WoRtH iT Of CoUrSe!!! WeLL iT ToOk NoT ToO LoNg To GeT iNtO ThE DaNcE CoNsiDeRiNg JoSh DiD WhAt We aLwAyS Do At LuNcH iN ThE LiNe (( LoL )) !!! ThEn i BoUgHt Me & DaViD EaCh A GLoW StiCk & a NeCkLaCe FoR Me! ThEn We WeNt AnD GoT A CoUpLe PiC DoNe AnD i WaS NeRvOuS CuZ i DoN't KnO HoW GoOd ThE PiC iS GoNNa CoMe OuT CuZ ThE GuY DiDn'T LeT Me StAnD ThE WaY i WaNtEd To!! ThEn We WeNt OnTo ThE DaNcE FLoOr AnD HuNg OuT NeXt To ThE RaVeR GrOuP ~~~~~~~~~~> (( RoDeL, AnDrEw, JeSSe, MiKe & NiCk )) aLL NiTe AnD iT WaS FuN ExCePt NoNe Of Mi BeSt FriEnDz ShOwEd Up LiKe i WaS PLaNNiNg So iT SuCkEd BeCaUsE oF ThAt! BeSiDeS ThAt Me & DaViD HaD FuN, aNd iT WaS NiCe HoMeCoMiNg DaNcE!!! WeLL ThAtS aLL FoR NoW, i DoN't KnO WhAt We ArE DoiN YeT FoR HaLLoWeEn BuT i WaS HoPiN' To GeT A RiDe DoWn To SiX FLaGs FoR FriGhTfEsT BuT ThAt DoEsN't LoOk LiKe iT iS GoNNa HaPPeN UnLeSs SoMeOnE CaN DriVe Me & WhOeVeR WaNtS To Go DoWn ThErE! AnD TheN JeSSe iS SuPpOsEd To HaVe A RaVe PaRtY BuT He DoEsN't HaVe A BiG EnoUgH PLaCe To HoSt iT So We ArE TrYiN' To FiNd SoMeWhErE WhErE We CaN HaVe ThE PaRtY, aNd MaYbE NiC CouLd JoiN HiS PaRtY WiTH JeSSe'S aNd We CouLd MaKe iT OnE BiG PaRtY At NiC's HoUsE !!! ThAt WouLd Be SoOo MuCh FuN!!! WeLL We WiLL SeE WhAt HaPPeNS!!! ~*~LoVe aLwAyS, KriSsY A.k.A. ThE PriNcEsS BrAT~*~

BuT NoT BLiNk-182 :-( BuT i FuCkiN LoVe ToM DeLoNgE, He LooKeD So HoT oUt ThErE oN StAgE & hE SmiLeD @ Me WhEn i WaS oN Mi Ex-BoYfRiEnD's ShOuLdErS & i WaS YeLLiNg i LoVe YoU ToM!!!! WoOt WoOt! BuT iF i WouLd HaVe KePt WaLkiNg BaCkStAgE SoMe MoRe i WouLd HaVe FoUnD ThE RoOm WhErE BLiNk WaS HaNgiN OuT AnD i WouLd HaVe MeT ThEm & EvErYtHiNg BuT i WaS UnAwArE oF WhAt WaS GoiNg On So i MiSSeD OuT bUt Mi FiRsT BLiNk CoNcErt & Mi FiRsT CoNcErT WaS SoOo AwEsOmE aNd i CaN't WaiT UnTiL i GeT To SeE ThEm AgAiN BuT HoPeFuLLi i WiLL b SeEiNg LiNkiN PaRk iN CoNcErT!!!!
